TASK: Craft an item of type: red_dye
inventory=[{"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 18, "index": 14}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 52, "index": 17}, {"type": "music_disc_wait", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "ravager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 63, "index": 19}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 21, "index": 23}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 26, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_wall", "quantity": 29, "index": 26}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "black_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 62, "index": 32}, {"type": "cyan_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 11, "index": 34}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 17, "index": 38}, {"type": "cyan_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft red_dye. Red_dye requires placing 1 red_tulip into the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the red_tulip from slot 36 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_dye
inventory=[{"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 18, "index": 14}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 52, "index": 17}, {"type": "music_disc_wait", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "ravager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 63, "index": 19}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 21, "index": 23}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 26, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_wall", "quantity": 29, "index": 26}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "black_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 62, "index": 32}, {"type": "cyan_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 11, "index": 34}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 17, "index": 38}, {"type": "cyan_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I can craft the red_dye by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
